name: pnp-disable-tenant-wide-extension
title: Disable specified Tenant-wide Extension
shortDescription: Script helps to disable the specified tenant wide extension based on the id parameter.
longDescription: Tenant Wide Extensions list from the App Catalog helps to manage the activation / deactivation of the tenant wide extensions. The below sample script helps to disable the specified tenant wide extension based on the id parameter.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
